Product_Name: Apple AirPods (3rd Generation) Wireless Ear Buds, Bluetooth Headphones, Personalized Spatial Audio, Sweat and Water Resistant, Lightning Charging Case Included, Up to 30 Hours of Battery Life
AI_Text: Customers like the sound quality of the headphones. They say it's great, with a big improvement in lower tones. Customers also appreciate the noise cancellation capabilities and the few methods for setting up the sound. However, some customers differ on performance.
